verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--"dāmodara, calaha nadīyā
mātāra samīpe tumi raha tāṅhā yāñā

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; dāmodara—My dear friend Dāmodara; calaha nadīyā—you had better go to Nadia (Navadvīpa); mātāra samīpe—in the care of My mother; tumi—you; raha—stay; tāṅhā—there; yāñā—going.
translation: The Lord said,"My dear friend Dāmodara, you had better go to Nadia and stay with My mother.
